name: Soccer Cup Pro 2022 - Football
description:
Play Soccer Cup Pro 2022 and win the world cup!

Enjoy premium soccer games with NO ADS.

Show other countries who have the best team on the planet and become a legend!

Live a unique soccer experience with incomparable realism! Train, come to the field, win all competitions and become a soccer star!

GAME MODES

Basics - Get acquainted with the controls, improve your skills and get ready for the real experience of the championships.

Daily Challenges - A set of 5 challenges every day.

Champions Cup - Best European teams meet every year to win the cup.

Europa - Win the European Cup which is held every 4 years.

Copa Del Sur - Compete with the best South American teams and be a soccer star.

Tournament - Win the world cup of 32 national teams and make history.

Season - Lead your team through the whole season to glory.

No sports game can be compared with this one in entertainment and the desire to win.

Natural player movements and in-depth tactics bring the true experience of a soccer game to your phone! Take full control of every action on the field and win all the championships.

Play Soccer Cup Pro 2022 and become a champion!
